message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, even more so than that price.
I appreciate your offer, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I understand that the product is valuable, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
